name: I Learned the Solution in Grade School

system.description:
When you unleash your powers to extend your senses or overcome an intellectual obstacle, you may roll + Superior instead of + Freak.

When you unleash your powers to overcome an obstacle, reshape your environment, or extend your senses, roll + Superior.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Mark Potential and the GM makes a move.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value: You do it. Mark a condition or the GM will tell you how the effect is  @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.LGWniZDyhHCEZxtg]{unstable} or @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.q24rfVSZIs8xQwya]{temporary}.
